detail_desc: Leggings in washed, stretch, patterned denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake front pockets.
Scarf in patterned satin. Size 90x90 cm.
Bracelets in various designs. Four elasticated and one in an adjustable length. Two decorated with shells.
Fabric belt with leather details and a metal buckle. Width 3 cm.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft viscose jersey in a double layer at the top. Gentle V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam and drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and wide legs.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft viscose jersey in a double layer at the top. Gentle V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam and drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and wide legs.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft viscose jersey in a double layer at the top. Gentle V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and an elasticated seam and drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and wide legs.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar with an opening and button at the front, pin-tucks at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in a crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar with an opening and button at the front, pin-tucks at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside. Sizes 3-9 with anti-slip protectors.
Wide jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and full feet.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and full feet.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and full feet.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit and pair of shorts with straps in an organic cotton blend. Bodysuit in soft jersey with buttons at the top, press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves. Shorts in an airy textured weave with patch front pockets, sewn-in turn-ups at the hems and straps that cross at the back and button at the front.
Short-sleeved dress in a crinkled, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons at the front. Elastication and a drawstring with twisted ties at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and ankle-length legs with sewn-in creases.
Cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a high waist, concealed zip in one side and ankle-length legs with sewn-in creases.
Calf-length dress in softly draping satin with a draped neckline and open back. Spaghetti shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back and a high slit in one side. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in softly draping satin with a draped neckline and open back. Spaghetti shoulder straps that cross and tie at the back and a high slit in one side. Unlined.
Cropped top in woven fabric with wide shoulder straps and ties that fasten into a bow at the back. Lined.
Cropped top in woven fabric with wide shoulder straps and ties that fasten into a bow at the back. Lined.
Short, wide pyjama top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.

Trousers in lightweight, stretch twill with a high waist, zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight legs that flare gently from the knees and have creases.
Long-sleeved top in an airy, rib-knit viscose blend. Open back with a twisted detail.
Trousers in soft cotton denim with a high waist, zip fly and hook-and-eye fasteners. Belt with D-rings, side pockets, back pockets and skinny legs.
Short-sleeved top in soft, striped cotton jersey with a wider neckline and gathers in the sides for a more comfortable fit.
Thin metal chain anklet decorated with small, round, metal pendants. Adjustable length 23-27 cm.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Joggers in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Joggers in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Metal earrings with narrow hoops and a round pendant with a plastic stone at the bottom. Length approx. 4 cm.
Metal earrings with narrow hoops and a round pendant with a plastic stone at the bottom. Length approx. 4 cm.
Metal earrings with narrow hoops and a round pendant with a plastic stone at the bottom. Length approx. 4 cm.
Pyjamas in soft viscose jersey with lace details. V-neck top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and short shorts with an elasticated waist.
V-neck top in silk crêpe with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
V-neck top in silk crêpe with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.
V-neck top in silk crêpe with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps.

Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with an embroidered pattern, wide shoulder straps and scalloped trim at the neckline. Seam with hole-embroidered lace trim at the top, wide smocking at the back and a gently flared skirt with a scalloped hem. Lined.
Bracelets in various designs. Three of thin metal chains with decorations and one with plastic beads. Adjustable length 16.5-20.5 cm.
Shirt dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and flap chest pockets. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Wide dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the hips and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.

Wide dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and V-shaped opening at the front. Long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the hips and a gathered, flared skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in an airy linen and cotton weave with buttons down the front and a smocked back. Gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Lined.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Sun hat in cotton seersucker with ties under the chin. Width of brim approx. 4 cm. Lined.
Short jersey skirt with a high, elasticated paper bag waist. Unlined.

Knee-length, padded coat in woven fabric with a lined hood with an elasticated drawstring, and a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front. Fleece-lined handwarmer pockets, one inner pocket and large, fleece-lined patch front pockets with a flap and concealed press-studs. Ribbed cuffs and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Lined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front, a contrasting colour peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck, collar, and buttons down the front. Yoke at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Treggings in narrow-wale cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and legs with glittery stripes down the sides.
Cap in herringbone-weave cotton with an imitation leather appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short coat in woven fabric with a zip down the front, padded shoulders, a pleat at the back and flap front pockets. Lined.

Straight-cut blouse with a smocked stand-up collar and an opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with a frill and smocking at the cuffs.
Straight-cut blouse with a smocked stand-up collar and an opening at the back with buttons at the back of the neck. Long puff sleeves with a frill and smocking at the cuffs.

Jumper in a soft rib knit with a deep V-neck and lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Waist belt in crocodile-patterned imitation leather with a round metal buckle and a matching, detachable pouch with a flap and metal ring closure. Lined. Width of belt approx. 2.5 cm. Size of bag approx 2.5x11.5x17 cm.
Coat in a soft wool blend with notch lapels, a one-button fastening at the front, side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.

Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, flap welt front pockets, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
